quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Little Richard
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, wilsons, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Gretchen Wilson is country music singer, whose debut album, Here for the Party,  was released in 2004.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In 1987 Little Richard conducted the marriage of this famous couple.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bruce Willis and Demi Moore

questions.question: What song was released by The Beatles in 1995 to celebrate their reunion and promote their compilation album Anthology 1?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Free as a Bird

questions.question: Complete the following lyrics from Gretchen Wilsons song, When It Rains.

options.text: d I cant take one more day of gray
I will prevail, yes I will
Dont you know dont you know
I will just try to chill

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dont you know dont you know

questions.question: Which Batman movie featured U2s song Hold Me, Thrill Me, Kiss Me, Kill Me in 1995?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Batman Forever

questions.question: Gretchen Wilsons song The Bed, from her album Here for the Party, features country duo Big  Rich.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Little Richards early hits got a lot of air time on the first completely black-owned radio station. What are the call letters of this station?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: WERD

questions.question: What was the name of the first group in which Little Richard sang?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Penniman Singers

questions.question: Why did Little Richard briefly quit  music in 1957?

options.text: He had a vision of his own damnation while on tour in Australia.
He was too affected by his drug habit.
He opened his own church in Alabama.
He could not get a record label to sign him because of his make-up.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He had a vision of his own damnation while on tour in Australia.

questions.question: What 1995 song became the second longest running number one and best selling debut single in the USA?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Macarena

questions.question: Little Richard was born on December 5th. Which statement concerning his birth is true?

options.text: He was born Richard  Wagner Penniman in Macon, Georgia in 1932.
He was born Richard Wagner Penniman in Atlanta in 1931.
He was born Richard Wagner Penniman in New York City in 1935.
He was born Richard Wayne Penniman in Macon, Georgia in 1932.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was born Richard Wayne Penniman in Macon, Georgia in 1932.

questions.question: How many #1 hits did Little Richard have on either the RB or Pop charts?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: In 1955 Little Richard had his first charted hit. This song hit  #17 on the pop charts and #2 on the RB charts. What was the song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tuttie Frutti

questions.question: Which of these was not a member of one of Little Richards groups?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ray Charles

questions.question: What does TLC advise us not to chase in their massive 1995 hit Waterfalls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Waterfalls

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: T-Pain

questions.question: What artist performed the break up song about too many fishing trips, Im Gonna Miss Her (The Fishin Song), in 2002?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brad Paisley

questions.question: What 1980s hair band gave us You Give Love a Bad Name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bon Jovi

questions.question: Britney Spears recorded the song Goodbye to You in 2001.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which one of these afflictions does Little Richard have?

options.text: He is legally blind in one eye.
One of his legs is shorter than the other by almost three inches.
His eyes are of different color.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One of his legs is shorter than the other by almost three inches.

questions.question: Which popular rock group released the song Miss You in 1978?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Rolling Stones

questions.question: The following lyrics are from the song Cant Stand Losing You by the Police.:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The popular song Love Hurts by Nazareth has also been performed by Cher.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which two country artists performed the song A Bad Goodbye together?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clint Blck  Wynona

questions.question: What rapper became famous for the song Act a Fool?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ludacris

questions.question: Which of these artists sang Mother and Child Reunion?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Simon

questions.question: Which female country artist released the song Big Deal in 1999?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: LeAnn Rimes

questions.question: In 1986 Little Richard was voted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Where is it located?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cleveland

questions.question: Which popular band released the brake up song Leave in 2000?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Matchbox 20
